Graphical parameters

Change graphical parameters such as, titles, legend, colors, axis limits, scale transformation (log, sqrt), axis ticks and plot orientation (vertical, horizontal).

Graphical parameters

  • ggpar

  • show_line_types

  • show_point_shapes

  • labs_pubr
